channel.title: Npcs facing east?
channel.description: Can I make Npcs facing east? Do you have a tut for it? :| ;D

item.title: Npcs facing east?
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

[quote=“Shift, post:4, topic:115854”][quote author=AD LVL 7 link=topic=165141.msg1539237#msg1539237 date=1182706836]
not coded yet,
but this:

public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) { viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1); viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1); dirUpdate2Required = true; updateRequired = true; }
is for players, maybe if you inport it to Npchandler ?
[/quote]

You can’t simply ‘inport’ things. There are different update masks that it uses. I think the NPC turning towards a point is 4, and two unsigned big endians for the coordinates.[/quote]

I know, but when I say Import, i mean add ‘something alike it’

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs facing east?
item.dc:creator: @Shift Shift
item.description:
@Shift wrote:

[quote=“AD LVL 7, post:2, topic:115854”]not coded yet,
but this:

public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) { viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1); viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1); dirUpdate2Required = true; updateRequired = true; }
is for players, maybe if you inport it to Npchandler ?[/quote]

You can’t simply ‘inport’ things. There are different update masks that it uses. I think the NPC turning towards a point is 4, and two unsigned big endians for the coordinates.

Read full topic
